title: Southwark Minicab operators targeting corporate business travelers to boost revenue
text:
Travel Articles | October 7, 2015 
In order to grow their business and increase revenue, Southwark Minicab operators are targeting corporate business travelers with innovative deals and offers. 
This is part of a planned strategy brought out by Southwark Minicab operators in order to leverage the benefits offered by membership to the Taxicode Network.Why are Southwark Minicab operators targeting corporate business travelers?Southwark Minicab operators reach out to corporate travelers by sending them promotional emails and newsletters. Regular follow ups are done by the sales teams of Southwark Minicab operators in order to convince corporate travelers that their taxi services are well priced, efficient and economical. Through regular interactions done on the phone or via email Southwark Minicab operators get to understand the needs and requirements of corporate travelers and accordingly offer them the services.What unique services are Southwark Minicab operators offering?Some of the requirements relate to the pick- up and drop facilities provided by corporates to their employees. As employees stay in far off places that are not well connected by buses, trams or by the Tube, corporate have a need for Southwark Minicab operators that can pick-up their employees in the morning from their homes and bring them to office. Similarly in the evening employees need to be dropped back to their offices. This service is required 5 days a week. The time of the pick-up and the drop is well defined and so is the route of the journey. This information helps Southwark Minicab operators to define and plan their route of travel well in advance. In case any corporate traveler is changing his residence and moving to a new address, the route of the journey is changed accordingly.Corporate travelers also require Southwark Minicabs for doing transfers to railway stations and airports. Due to business needs corporate need to regularly send their employees to different destinations across the globe and for these journeys that require reaching to the airport in time, corporates prefer to rely on experienced Southwark Minicab operators. This is particularly important because sometimes trains for arrival and departure are either very early in the day or very late in the night. In both cases it is not feasible to use either the bus network or the Tube. Also when corporate travelers are travelling to international destinations the flights are at odd hours and in such instances Southwark Minicabs are the best answer. How well trained are Southwark Minicab operators?Southwark Minicabs are also trained to wait for their clients in case the flights get delayed or in case arrival of trains is late. The drivers of Southwark Minicabs are polite and courteous and ensure that they pick up and drop their staff to the required destination in a timely way. In order to pamper their clients Southwark Minicab operators ensure that their fleet of taxis and minicabs is always ready to embark on a long journey The Southwark Minicab operators regularly send their vehicles for inspection and servicing.
